Hi,

  The division by zero was triggered in the 'speciate' method. But it'=
s better now : instead of initializing with the population as one single in=
dividual, I initialize it with the population size set in the Global object=
. And, pooof, error gone.

  Apart from the Population object, should I ini=
tialize more things by hand, like species ? What is the sequence to call fo=
r initialization ? and inside the optimization loop (so far speciate() then=
 produceNextGeneration()) ?

Alex

etRandom().nextUniform());
